name: Collect the Coin
description:
WASD arrow keys will not work

Collect the Coin but avoid the Skulls

The hearts give you 50 health

The shield firstly give you health then you gain Shields

Max health: 100

No max Shields

I just realised I spelled Shields wrong in the game

Will be fixed

fixed in version 1.1

1.1 also has a wooden background instead of white

might not work on Linux but give it a go
